message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's be reasonable. This offer ensures you get more than you would in the next round, even with inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want the bigger share
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it - any further delay hurts us both.
You said it hurts us both, but it actually only hurts you. I'll take advantage of that
Okay, Alice, you win.  Let's split it evenly before inflation eats away at my share any further.
